'''Craster's wife''' is a character in the [[Season 3|third]] season.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
She is one of [[Craster]]'s [[Craster's wives|wives]] who he has married. It is unstated whether or not she's his daughter.
===[[Season 3]]===
Along with [[Craster's younger wife |another of Craster's wives]] she delivers [[Gilly's baby]] while [[Samwell Tarly]] watches.<ref>"[[Walk of Punishment]]"</ref>
